00045 typedef struct mpc_reader_t {
00047         mpc_int32_t (*read)(void *t, void *ptr, mpc_int32_t size);
00048 
00050         BOOL (*seek)(void *t, mpc_int32_t offset);
00051 
00053         mpc_int32_t (*tell)(void *t);
00054 
00056         mpc_int32_t (*get_size)(void *t);
00057 
00059         BOOL (*canseek)(void *t);
00060 
00063     void *data;
00064 
00065     // These are used by provided internal standard file-based reader implementation.
00066     // You shouldn't touch them.  They're included in the main struct to avoid
00067     // malloc/free.
00068     FILE *file;
00069     long file_size;
00070     BOOL is_seekable;
00071 } mpc_reader;
